mapper.select: select op.out_put_poll_id, op.out_put_id, op.pollutant_code, pc.pollutant_name_cn, pc.pollutant_name_en, pc.pollutant_unit_en, pc.pollutant_unit_cn, pc.unit_pf_cn, pc.unit_pf_en, op.pollutant_sort, op.alarm_type, op.is_zero_alarm, op.is_continuity_alarm, op.standard_val, op.annual_limit_value, op.monthly_limit_value, op.early_warn_maxValue, op.early_warn_minValue, op.over_maxValue, op.over_minValue, op.exception_maxValue, op.exception_minValue, op.create_user, op.create_time, op.update_user, op.update_time, op.mon_factor from t_ent_output_pollutant op left join t_bas_pollutant_code pc on pc.pollutant_code = op.pollutant_code where op.out_put_poll_id = #{outPutPollId}

select op.out_put_poll_id, op.out_put_id, op.pollutant_code, pc.pollutant_name_cn, pc.pollutant_name_en, pc.pollutant_unit_en, pc.pollutant_unit_cn, pc.unit_pf_cn, pc.unit_pf_en, op.pollutant_sort, op.alarm_type, op.is_zero_alarm, op.is_continuity_alarm, op.standard_val, op.annual_limit_value, op.monthly_limit_value, op.early_warn_maxValue, op.early_warn_minValue, op.over_maxValue, op.over_minValue, op.exception_maxValue, op.exception_minValue, op.create_user, op.create_time, op.update_user, op.update_time, op.mon_factor from t_ent_output_pollutant op left join t_bas_pollutant_code pc on pc.pollutant_code = op.pollutant_code where op.out_put_id = #{outPutId} order by op.pollutant_sort desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_ent_output_pollutant
out_put_poll_id, out_put_id, pollutant_code, pollutant_sort, alarm_type, is_zero_alarm, is_continuity_alarm, standard_val, annual_limit_value, monthly_limit_value, early_warn_maxValue, early_warn_minValue, over_maxValue, over_minValue, exception_maxValue, exception_minValue, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, mon_factor,
#{outPutPollId}, #{outPutId}, #{pollutantCode}, #{pollutantSort}, #{alarmType}, #{isZeroAlarm}, #{isContinuityAlarm}, #{standardVal}, #{annualLimitValue}, #{monthlyLimitValue}, #{earlyWarnMaxvalue}, #{earlyWarnMinvalue}, #{overMaxvalue}, #{overMinvalue}, #{exceptionMaxvalue}, #{exceptionMinvalue}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{monFactorStr},
